activities.title: Ride the Sablette Ferris Wheel
activities.description: SCatch sweeping views of Algiers and the sea on a relaxing ride aboard the iconic Sablette Ferris wheel.

activities.title: Dress in a Traditional Hayek in Algiers' Casbah
activities.description: Try on the elegant white garment once worn by women in Algiers and stroll through the historic streets.

activities.title: Sip Mint Tea with Locals in Ghardaïa
activities.description: Discover the Sahara's warm hospitality while sharing sweet mint tea in the M'zab valley.

activities.title: Go Horseback Riding Along the Beaches of Tipaza
activities.description: Ride horses on scenic coastal paths near ancient Roman ruins — an unforgettable blend of nature and history.

activities.title: Attend a Live Chaabi or Andalusian Music Show
activities.description: Feel the soul of Algeria through its traditional music — performed in cozy venues or at cultural festivals.

activities.title: Experience a Henna Session with Local Artisans
activities.description: Get traditional henna designs while learning about their cultural meaning and symbolism.

activities.title: Cook Couscous with an Algerian Family
activities.description: Take part in preparing the national dish and share a homemade meal full of warmth and tradition.

activities.title: Explore a Traditional Market (Souk)
activities.description: Discover local spices, textiles, and handmade crafts — and try your hand at bargaining.

activities.title: Wild Encounters at Hama Zoo
activities.description: Meet lions, monkeys, and exotic birds at Hama Zoo — a peaceful escape in the heart of Algiers, perfect for families and animal lovers.
